# liveContent()

**Type Method**

Creates the default configuration for a badge representing live content.

## Declaration

```swift
static func liveContent() -> TVMediaItemContentConfiguration.BadgeProperties
```

## Return Value

A new [doc://com.apple.tvuikit/documentation/TVUIKit/TVMediaItemContentConfiguration-swift.struct/BadgeProperties-swift.struct] instance.

## Creating a Default Configuration

- **default()**: Creates the default configuration for a badge.
